meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>continue</kanji> and then you <kanji>continue</kanji> again (that's the <kanji>repeater</kanji> kanji), you get things happening <vocabulary>one after another</vocabulary>. Continue continue continue!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
